content: //tossinghandgrenades.wordpress.com/2008/05/16/army-ng-trucks-defaced/ I took these pictures at Camp Shelby, MS. They are vehicles of the Pennsylvania National Guards vehicles that were vandalized while on the rails en route to Mississippi. These soldiers are performing training before deploying to Iraq. For me I believe this is an absolute shame to have this done and I know that there will not be any mention of these wronged soldiers in the MSM. These soldiers deserve our support, what you think of the situation does not matter. These soldiers are serving; they are doing what they are supposed to do. They are doing things and living a life that most Americans cannot even imagine. If you hate Bush, go after him, but I've noticed the bombs, bullets and missiles are still flying under the President we have now. If you hate DC, go after DC, but never place such weight on the shoulders of these soldiers, they carry enough. These soldiers are us. They are the same people we are. They are the same people you went to school with. What is even sadder it is these same vandals, that when they are in need, will be calling on these same soldiers to come save them when the time comes. Pathetic *******s that these vandals are. I am so angered at the stupidity, cowardice, and probably blind following of some rabid liberal anti-military ideology behind such acts. I am also sure that there are many such acts that never get any attention whatsoever. I bet if this was done to a mosque there would be no end to the cries of hate crimes and how bad we Americans are and more self loathing. But this gets done to our soldiers, not a peep. If this had been done to anything related to Muslims CAIR would be filing lawsuits and the MSM would be calling America nothing but a land of Racist, cause ya know, EVERYTHING is about racism. (Sarcasm) (Take note, one picture has anti-Semitic remark.) Well, here is my shout of rage against these pigs; here is my loathing of spineless Americans that would bow before our enemies while hiding behind our soldiers. Here is my battle cry against the Machine of Cowardice that is killing our country for the sake of being nice to the people that want to kill us all. To all the people that support the enemy, at least have the courage to go fight with them. Meet the same fate they do, instead of just buying spray paint. Otherwise to me, all Americans, and probably the people you demented sheep believe in, you are nothing but cowards and take an easy path where you only have to have enough courage to buy paint and never actually make any kind of real stand. Weak weak weak. Support the troops, put shame on such cowardly acts, and stop the brainwashing.

content: We have busybody homeowner's associations (HOAs) that prohibit the national flag, (or ANY flag or banner, for that matter) from being "flown, displayed or made in any way visible on or to the exterior of any structure(s) within the areas of the 'common areas'/community of this HOA..." Is THIS the America we think or have been (mis)led to believe it is? This may astound some of you here...but there are Americans who are being SUED and/or monetarily punished and targeted for "displaying" the US flag on THEIR OWN PROPERTY! Many have veterans in their families, or just support our troops in general. The "displays", as the greedy, liberal, and clearly UN-AMERICAN lawyers and other busybodies disparagingly refer to, are; clean, neat, often NEW flagpoles, standards and guidons designed specifically and solely for such 'displays' of flags. Apparently, it is just ultra-unacceptable to display ANY kind of 'support' or manifestion of a political viewpoint in a HOA, especially 'pro-troop' or 'pro-mission'. What a bunch of Commie crap, huh? A red banner with a yellow hammer-and-sickle logo in the middle would likely be unanimously approved by said nefarious and ever-meddlesome HOA boards. They NEVER 'get it'!! Go figure! - LHA-3 Rusty

content: I have a flagpole with the National Ensigh and the Navy ensign below it flying most of the time as long aas it is not freezing cold. No one can tell me to take them down or not fly it. Such things would never happen in my town where I live. The American Legion and VFW and a host of other organizations here (Lions, Jaycees, etc) wouldn't let that happen, mainly because alot of those organizations are chaired and led by men and women who are, have been vets. Plus our town is patriotic, you see alot of flags being flownb around here. We don't need no stinkin' commie lovin, liberal pinko idotic bleeding heart people like that here. Patriotism, the American way of life, love for country, love of freedom still reigns here. GOD BLESS AMERICA! LAND OF THE FREE AND HOME OF THE BRAVE!!!!!!

content: We had some neighbors with some festive mylar balloons set out for their severely injured milvet son's return from the Walter Reed hospital, where he'd been in therapy for almost a year after being nearly killed by an IED. The balloons were spray-painted with black paint and gang jibberish, then shot with B-BS and ruined. A black "X" was sprayed over one side of the American flag balloon, gang nonsense on the other side. The yellow ribbons were torn up and sprayed as well. The family was even more saddened by grafitti on the sides of the house, and freshly-planted, colorful flowers that had been urinated on and ruined by the despicable perpetrator(s). Some "thanks", isn't it?

content: So right you are. I've already told numerous "anti-gun" and "anti-war" folks I've met to NOT come runnin' to me for protection or ANYTHING when the shat hits the fan, so to speak. I don't want teary-eyed excuses, reasons or apologies. It'll be too late by then. I'll have enough to do with my fellow Americans who ARE doing due diligence RIGHT NOW, TODAY, and have been doing so all along. That's the reality. Liberalism/socialism is a clearly ingrained 'disease' that is fast undermining literal centuries of hard-fought battles that have kept us a free(sic) nation. Too many understand the cost, having paid it, while too few today appreciate it sufficiently to assure its survival. Just look at and listen to the truly "un-American" Nancy Pelosi, Harry Reid, and on up the chain of command...their true 'plans' and 'vision' for this country are beyond frightening...not what we fought for!!

content: We have busybody homeowner's associations (HOAs) that prohibit the national flag, (or ANY flag or banner, for that matter) from being "flown, displayed or made in any way visible on or to the exterior of any structure(s) within the areas of the 'common areas'/community of this HOA..." Is THIS the America we think or have been (mis)led to believe it is? This may astound some of you here...but there are Americans who are being SUED and/or monetarily punished and targeted for "displaying" the US flag on THEIR OWN PROPERTY! Many have veterans in their families, or just support our troops in general. The "displays", as the greedy, liberal, and clearly UN-AMERICAN lawyers and other busybodies disparagingly refer to, are; clean, neat, often NEW flagpoles, standards and guidons designed specifically and solely for such 'displays' of flags. Apparently, it is just ultra-unacceptable to display ANY kind of 'support' or manifestion of a political viewpoint in a HOA, especially 'pro-troop' or 'pro-mission'. What a bunch of Commie crap, huh? A red banner with a yellow hammer-and-sickle logo in the middle would likely be unanimously approved by said nefarious and ever-meddlesome HOA boards. They NEVER 'get it'!! Go figure! - LHA-3 Rusty

content: I have a flagpole with the National Ensigh and the Navy ensign below it flying most of the time as long aas it is not freezing cold. No one can tell me to take them down or not fly it. Such things would never happen in my town where I live. The American Legion and VFW and a host of other organizations here (Lions, Jaycees, etc) wouldn't let that happen, mainly because alot of those organizations are chaired and led by men and women who are, have been vets. Plus our town is patriotic, you see alot of flags being flownb around here. We don't need no stinkin' commie lovin, liberal pinko idotic bleeding heart people like that here. Patriotism, the American way of life, love for country, love of freedom still reigns here. GOD BLESS AMERICA! LAND OF THE FREE AND HOME OF THE BRAVE!!!!!!

content: We had some neighbors with some festive mylar balloons set out for their severely injured milvet son's return from the Walter Reed hospital, where he'd been in therapy for almost a year after being nearly killed by an IED. The balloons were spray-painted with black paint and gang jibberish, then shot with B-BS and ruined. A black "X" was sprayed over one side of the American flag balloon, gang nonsense on the other side. The yellow ribbons were torn up and sprayed as well. The family was even more saddened by grafitti on the sides of the house, and freshly-planted, colorful flowers that had been urinated on and ruined by the despicable perpetrator(s). Some "thanks", isn't it?

content: So right you are. I've already told numerous "anti-gun" and "anti-war" folks I've met to NOT come runnin' to me for protection or ANYTHING when the shat hits the fan, so to speak. I don't want teary-eyed excuses, reasons or apologies. It'll be too late by then. I'll have enough to do with my fellow Americans who ARE doing due diligence RIGHT NOW, TODAY, and have been doing so all along. That's the reality. Liberalism/socialism is a clearly ingrained 'disease' that is fast undermining literal centuries of hard-fought battles that have kept us a free(sic) nation. Too many understand the cost, having paid it, while too few today appreciate it sufficiently to assure its survival. Just look at and listen to the truly "un-American" Nancy Pelosi, Harry Reid, and on up the chain of command...their true 'plans' and 'vision' for this country are beyond frightening...not what we fought for!!
